channel.title: Free - deep relaxation, meditation, crystal singing bowls, peace.
channel.description: Relaxation and meditation with Raym and Chicchan from www.global-healing.com. Crystal singing bowls with guided meditation, self empowerment, peace.

item.title: Crystal singing bowls from Crystal Dreaming CD
item.description: Relax and enjoy the sounds of 9 pure quartz crystak singing bowls from Chicchan's CD Cryatal Dreaming

item.title: Sample of pure quartz crystal singing bowls inner Temple
item.description: Please enjoy this short sample of Chicchan playing her pure quartz crystal singing bowls taken from her CD "Inner Temple"

item.title: Relaxation and protection meditaion
item.description: Enjoy this simple meditation any time of day. It is a great way to start your day and can be used to de-stress anytime. If you feel you are about to enter a challenging situation, (job interview, meeting etc) then take some time out and listen to and practice this meditation. It will help enormously. Namaste,Raym.
